let input =
  '1000\n2000\n3000\n\n4000\n\n5000\n6000\n\n7000\n8000\n9000\n\n10000';

input = '18313\n2404\n10479\n\n7011\n10279\n1496\n10342\n8918\n3162\n4525\n4368\n\n17242\n\n10920\n14072\n9754\n4435\n9396\n\n5915\n2602\n4032\n3303\n2685\n1856\n1334\n4865\n6385\n1733\n5328\n\n8899\n5482\n3195\n7837\n8986\n13794\n\n25121\n22211\n21257\n\n6360\n4007\n5124\n2266\n6943\n6966\n3887\n3427\n1255\n5266\n6119\n2841\n\n6167\n3883\n2776\n5894\n2013\n6930\n6613\n4637\n5259\n2347\n3550\n5639\n5117\n\n4530\n5961\n5956\n2503\n5060\n4770\n5240\n4123\n4089\n6794\n3333\n5244\n4415\n\n1733\n1209\n4458\n1223\n3859\n7728\n9793\n8350\n\n2278\n3241\n4668\n1836\n3669\n2996\n1772\n5016\n6294\n6367\n1080\n5964\n5547\n\n4793\n13744\n9478\n7979\n1490\n12490\n\n6770\n7282\n2059\n5242\n13237\n9365\n\n2230\n6498\n1352\n3846\n3863\n6205\n5803\n2646\n4188\n4431\n6380\n1526\n2620\n4438\n\n24331\n23578\n\n4199\n5126\n5725\n1123\n2415\n5427\n5789\n4856\n2610\n4833\n3398\n4239\n1432\n5122\n\n5013\n4939\n11760\n8419\n5706\n3765\n10182\n\n11795\n9688\n1712\n2091\n9651\n13022\n\n10393\n11862\n1672\n5431\n6812\n1866\n5599\n\n2036\n6561\n4097\n3467\n4739\n7656\n3252\n4322\n5068\n2345\n4155\n\n3090\n1228\n1270\n8407\n8118\n4996\n7157\n3944\n6230\n2728\n\n5669\n2113\n3076\n1290\n7673\n1022\n5805\n5128\n7912\n7862\n4955\n\n20640\n\n4131\n4874\n5220\n9947\n9739\n1662\n9418\n9684\n\n4875\n3073\n1151\n11911\n10310\n10793\n10307\n\n6979\n4265\n8322\n3518\n1855\n4912\n5481\n7124\n4664\n\n19975\n16112\n19450\n7231\n\n3909\n4743\n3794\n4448\n3200\n3447\n3331\n7011\n3345\n3935\n6750\n\n3900\n14850\n4890\n9625\n4832\n\n23682\n1375\n\n7463\n8112\n10624\n1105\n6625\n5157\n5839\n1019\n\n19089\n36719\n\n5372\n7085\n8536\n8717\n6255\n5961\n3198\n7729\n3055\n\n4406\n2263\n6686\n1458\n2377\n2740\n1284\n3045\n7121\n3070\n\n19161\n10515';

const elfFoodCalList = input.split('\n\n');
let elfWithMostCalId: number = 0;
let mostCalsCarried: number = 0;

for (let i: number = 1; i <= elfFoodCalList.length; i++) {
  const elfFoodCals = elfFoodCalList[i-1];
  let thisCalCount: number = 0
  for (let cal of elfFoodCals.split('\n')) {
    thisCalCount += parseFloat(cal)
  }
  if (thisCalCount > mostCalsCarried) {
    elfWithMostCalId = i;
    mostCalsCarried = thisCalCount;
  }
}
console.log(`Elf ${elfWithMostCalId} has most number of calories - ${mostCalsCarried}`);
